name: John Doe
text: Hi there! We provide loans to customers with a credit score of more than 500. We offer a variety of products such as health insurance, life insurance, car loans, home loans, and personal loans. The interest rate depends on the customer's credit score and can range from 9-15%. Is there anything else I can help you with?

name: John Doe
text: Thank you for your message. We're sorry to hear about your father's health issues. We offer a variety of products, including health insurance and life insurance, that may be beneficial for your father. Please contact us for more information on how we can help.
